item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: This content for this page is currently hidden and will be live shortly. [comment]: <> ( Now that you’ve spent time with each of the three major (most prominent, most discussed) theories of recent philosophical ethics, and have thought about how to apply them to a few hypothetical situations, I want you to think about how you would apply them to real situations. Find in you memory a real example of a choice that has moral dimensions, as experienced by you or someone you directly know.
